info.jonclark.treegraft.core.tokens
Class TokenFactory<T extends Token>

java.lang.Object
  info.jonclark.treegraft.core.tokens.TokenFactory<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
N -
Direct Known Subclasses:
IntegerTokenFactory, StringTokenFactory
public abstract class TokenFactory<T extends Token>
extends java.lang.Object

Responsible for mapping input strings to unique tokens so that they can be efficiently compared and hashed. Also, the SymbolFactory must ensure that the identifiers produced for terminals and nonterminals never overlap. (e.g. We don't want the string literal "A" to collide with the non-terminal "A").

Author:
jon
